001package gust.backend.model;
002
003import com.google.protobuf.Descriptors;
004import tools.elide.core.FieldType;
005
006import javax.annotation.Nonnull;
007
008
009/** Specifies that a model was missing a required annotated-field for a given operation. */
010public final class MissingAnnotatedField extends PersistenceException {
011  /** Specifies the descriptor that violated the required field constraint. */
012  private final @Nonnull Descriptors.Descriptor violatingSchema;
013
014  /** Field type that was required but not found. */
015  private final @Nonnull FieldType requiredField;
016
017  /**
018   * Create an exception describing a missing, but required, annotated schema field.
019   *
020   * @param descriptor Descriptor for the message type in question.
021   * @param type Field type that was required but missing.
022   */
023  MissingAnnotatedField(@Nonnull Descriptors.Descriptor descriptor, @Nonnull FieldType type) {
024    super(String.format(
025      "Model type '%s' failed to be processed, because it is missing the annotated field '%s', " +
026      "which was required for the requested operation.",
027      descriptor.getName(),
028      type.name()));
029
030    this.violatingSchema = descriptor;
031    this.requiredField = type;
032  }
033
034  // -- Getters -- //
035
036  /** @return Descriptor for the schema type which violated the required-field constraint. */
037  public @Nonnull Descriptors.Descriptor getViolatingSchema() {
038    return violatingSchema;
039  }
040
041  /** @return The type of field that must be added to pass the failing constraint. */
042  public @Nonnull FieldType getRequiredField() {
043    return requiredField;
044  }
045}
